page.title: 04LIfestyle of schoolboy SUN
page.content: I am writing about Sunday.I had slept at my gran's house the night before.At 10 o'clock I got up,dressed, and packed my pyjamas in my bag.I washed, brushed my teeth and went down for breakfast.I had cornflakes,toast,and a cup of chocolate, then went home.My mum was packing to go to the beach at Polkerris.We got into our Cortina car and drove off.When we arrived we payed 50p to park.We walked to the beach.My dad and I got undressed,pumped up our boat,and went into the sea.The water was very cold, so most of the time I stayed in the boat.We left the sea, played tennis,then had dinner which consisted of sandwiches and crisps, and later we had an ice cream.
